entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
